subjects.desc: minimum amount of subjects required to have overlapping data

method.desc: methods for calculating the significance probability

neighbours.desc: minimum number of channels required (for cluster), 0 means only channelcombination is considered

combinationneighbours.desc: indicate whether to consider channel combinations as neighbours

p.desc: critical value for cluster and single-sample

diagnostics.desc: at least one has to be specified to generate images, in case of specifying more than one

snapshotfwoi.desc: timefrequencywindow-of-interest for snapshots specified as [start stop] in Hz (or as Nx2 matrix), [] means averaging over the available range

snapshottwoi.desc: timefrequencywindow-of-interest for snapshots specified as [start stop] in milliseconds (or as Nx2 matrix)
